context: I am looking to have a movie night with friends, would you have any suggestions?
Are you interested in chick flicks? Bridesmaids (2011) is a good one.
That movie is hilarious. The scene where they all get sick at the dress shop is the best.
I love a bit of everything. I really want to see Deadpool 2 (2018) but just don't have it in the budget at the moment. Deadpool (2016) is a great one. Funny and action packed.

context.content: Hello
Hi! What kind of movies do you like?
I'm into thrilling and adrenaline-pumping action movies, exciting and daring adventure movies, and emotional and thought-provoking dramas. What do you have in mind?
context.feelings: I love when I get unexpected movie recommendations. It's always a pleasant surprise to discover new and exciting films.

context.content: I would recommend Black Panther (2018)
What's Black Panther about? I'd love to know more details about it.
context.feelings: I'm pleasantly surprised by the recommendation, but I need more details to see if it covers all my preferred genres. I wonder what Black Panther is all about.

context.content: It's a superhero movie that's about a superhero who is a cop and he's a cop

context.feelings: I appreciate the effort, but Black Panther doesn't seem to cover all the genres I'm looking for. I'll have to pass on this one. I hope the next recommendation will be a better fit.
